subject: Hockey, Ice
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin needs four more goals to achieve his next mark: becoming the leader in goals among Russian N.H.L. players, surpassing his former teammate and longtime friend Sergei Fedorov.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin needs four more goals to achieve his next mark: becoming the leader in goals among Russian N.H.L. players, surpassing his former teammate and longtime friend Sergei Fedorov.
